description:
Bullets are fired and the young boy’s body is hit.
How will people change when they lose the thing they should not lose?
Farewell friend...
Here is the first page of the test`s history...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The National Special-Level University Exam of Fate!
Tout se joue à l’examen national de sélection des élites !
Unmei no Kokka Tokkyuu Gakushi Shiken!
運命の国家特級学士試験!
